officialTitle: A Prospective Evaluation in a Non-Randomized Trial of the Safety and Efficacy of the Use of the TAXUS® ElementTM Paclitaxel-Eluting Coronary Stent System for the Treatment of De Novo Coronary Artery Lesions in Small Vessels

interventions.name: Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI) with paclitaxel-eluting stent (TAXUS Element) implantation

summary: The purpose of the TAXUS PERSEUS Small Vessel trial is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the next-generation Boston Scientific TAXUS paclitaxel-eluting coronary stent system (TAXUS® ElementTM) for the treatment of de novo atherosclerotic lesions of up to 20 mm in length in native coronary arteries of ≥ 2.25 mm to \< 2.75 mm diameter.

primaryOutcome.measure: In-stent Late Loss Measured by Quantitative Coronary Angiography (QCA)
